abstract: Burkina Faso military court issues arrest warrant for former Pres Blaise Compaore for his role in assassination of revolutionary leader Capt Thomas Sankara; Sankara and 12 of his supporters were killed in 1987 coup in which Campaore took power.
lead_paragraph: The international arrest warrant was issued in connection with the assassination of former President Thomas Sankara, who was killed during a 1987 coup that brought Mr. Compaoré to power.

headline.main: Burkina Faso Issues Arrest Warrant for Ex-President Blaise Compaoré
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Africa; Burkina Faso: Former Leader’s Arrest Is Sought in 1987 Coup-Related Killing

snippet: The international arrest warrant was issued in connection with the assassination of former President Thomas Sankara, who was killed during a 1987 coup that brought Mr. Compaoré to power.
